LanguageData.USAC_MechSupplierArrival.label: USAC mech supplier arrival
LanguageData.USAC_MechSupplierArrival.letterText: A USAC mech supplier ship has entered orbit. They are willing to trade mechs and weapons for corpse bags, mech wrecks, components, and hemogen packs.\n\nUse the comms console to contact them.
